overview: This movie adaptation of the popular theatre musical "Gerimis Mengundang" tells the story of a young man who is a pilot, played by Malaysian newcomer Kamal Adli. A chance meeting with the daughter of the Indonesia embassy officer who is played by Olivia Jensen Lubis, leads to a romance sparking between the two. However, with their different societal standings, will the two star-crossed lovers end up together?
tagline: Is It True, Love to the end ...[Benarkah Cinta Hingga Ke Penghujungnya...]
title: Gerimis Mengundang
